ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Opportunity__r.Mailing_State__c = "New Jersey", DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2021-04-10"), AND(OR(Wholesale_Fees__c >= 0.02 * Premium__c), Wholesale_Fees__c > 100))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Broker Fee cannot be greater than 2% of the premium for NJ.
